namelist_defaults.use_case_desc: Simulate transient land-use, and aerosol deposition changes from 2018 to current day with historical NEON data, also using data from CMIP6 SSP3-7.0 scenario for data not currently available
Simulate transient land-use, aerosol, and nitrogen deposition changes from 2018 to current day with historical NEON data, also using data from CMIP6 SSP3-7.0 scenario for data not currently available
